After this the beloved man of God, father Augus- tine, died, and his body was laid by the church of othe blessed apostles Peter and Paul (of which church we have made mention before), without the dooi thereos, because it was not yet finished nor dedicated. But as soon as the church was dedicated, his body was brought in and decently buried in the north chapel of the church: where also were interred the bodies of all the archbishops following, except two only, that is Theodore and Bertwald, whose bodies were laid in the church itself, because the said chapel could receive no more. This chapel hath almost in the middle of it an altar dedicated in the honour of the blessed pope Gregory, at the which altar every Saturday masses 1 in their memory are solemnly celebrated by the priest of that place.
